section.name: Other Content
section.p: It is not uncommon for web applications to show dynamically changing images or PDF reports on screen. In order to achieve this you would need to be able to write to the HTTP response yourself and avoid Struts trying to forward to a resource.

This can be done easily, just don't model any outgoing transitions on an action state which is deferring to a controller operation. It is this controller operation which will need to take care of the HTTP response.
